name: Rosa Cupiditatis (Demo)
description:
Story

Mara is on a quest to deliver a "package" in exchange for a large sum of money...

In this demo, you'll get a glimpse of the story of how Mara tries to get to a church in the middle of a religious festival at a town in Mexico called Xochitl Town.

Gameboy Controls on computer keyboard:

A button = Z

B button = X

Start button = Enter

Select button = Shift

Kickstarter

Support my game and help me finish this project here: https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/novaodos/rosa-cupiditatis?ref=project_build

Saving

After the tutorial (in case you chose it), you can save at any time if you press the "Select Button" (shift) and also you can save  inside Mara's car.


You can also save progress inside Mara's car in this demo.
